description.para: The 5 constants are the prefixes or suffixes for merge on read configuration.

The complete configuration keys can be:
fields.$field_name.aggregate-function
fields.$field_name.ignore-retract
fields.$field_names.sequence-group ($field_names support one or more field_name, split with FIELDS_SEPARATOR)

briefdescription.para: FIELDS_SEPARATOR is ",".
FIELDS_PREFIX is "fields".
AGG_FUNCTION is "aggregate-function".
DEFAULT_AGG_FUNCTION is "default-aggregate-function".
IGNORE_RETRACT is "ignore-retract".
SEQUENCE_GROUP is "sequence-group".
"bucket" - Bucket number for file store.

detaileddescription.para: It should either be equal to -1 (dynamic bucket mode), or it must be greater than 0 (fixed bucket mode).

briefdescription.para: "bucket-key" - Specify the paimon distribution policy.

detaileddescription.para: Data is assigned to each bucket according to the hash value of bucket-key. If you specify multiple fields, delimiter is ','. If not specified, the primary key will be used, if there is no primary key, the full row will be used.

briefdescription.para: "page-size" - Memory page size, default value 64 kb.
"file.format" - Specify the message format of data files.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is parquet.

briefdescription.para: "file-system" - Specify the file system.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is local.

briefdescription.para: "target-file-size" - Target size of a file. Default value is 128MB.
"blob.target-file-size" - Target size of a blob file. Default is TARGET_FILE_SIZE.
"partition.default-name" - The default partition name in case the dynamic partition column value is null/empty string.
"file.compression" - The default file compression is zstd.

detaileddescription.para: For faster read and write, it is recommended to use zstd.

briefdescription.para: "file.compression.zstd-level" Default file compression zstd level.

detaileddescription.para: For higher compression rates, it can be configured to 9, but the read and write speed will significantly decrease. Default value is 1.

briefdescription.para: "manifest.target-file-size" - Suggested file size of a manifest file.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 8MB.

briefdescription.para: "manifest.format" - Specify the message format of manifest files.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is orc.

briefdescription.para: "manifest.compression" - File compression for manifest, default value is zstd.
"manifest.merge-min-count" - To avoid frequent manifest merges, this parameter specifies the minimum number of ManifestFileMeta to merge, default value is 30.
"manifest.full-compaction-threshold-size" - The size threshold for triggering full compaction of manifest, default value is 16MB.
"source.split.target-size" - Target size of a source split when scanning a bucket.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 128MB.

briefdescription.para: "source.split.open-file-cost" - Open file cost of a source file.

detaileddescription.para: It is used to avoid reading too many files with a source split, which can be very slow. Default value is 4MB.

briefdescription.para: "scan.snapshot-id" - Optional snapshot id used in case of "from-snapshot" or "from-snapshot-full" scan mode
"scan.mode" - Specify the scanning behavior of the source.

detaileddescription.para: Values can be: "default", "latest-full", "latest", "from-snapshot", "from-snapshot-full". Default value is "default".

briefdescription.para: "read.batch-size" - Read batch size for any file format if it supports.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1024.

briefdescription.para: "write.batch-size" - Write batch size for any file format if it supports.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 1024.

briefdescription.para: "write-buffer-size" - Amount of data to build up in memory before converting to a sorted on-disk file.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is 256 mb

briefdescription.para: "snapshot.num-retained.min" - The minimum number of completed snapshots to retain.

detaileddescription.para: Should be greater than or equal to 1. Default value is 10

briefdescription.para: "snapshot.num-retained.max" - The maximum number of completed snapshots to retain.

detaileddescription.para: Should be greater than or equal to the minimum number. Default value is int32 max value.

briefdescription.para: "snapshot.time-retained" - The maximum time of completed snapshots to retain.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 1 hour.

briefdescription.para: "snapshot.expire.limit" - The maximum number of snapshots allowed to expire at a time.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is 10.

briefdescription.para: "snapshot.clean-empty-directories" - Whether to try to clean empty directories when expiring snapshots, if enabled, please note: hdfs: may print exceptions in NameNode.

detaileddescription.para: oss/s3: may cause performance issue. Default value is false.

briefdescription.para: "commit.timeout" - Timeout duration of retry when commit failed. No default value.
"commit.max-retries" - Maximum number of retries when commit failed. Default value is 10.
"sequence.field" - The field that generates the sequence number for primary key table, the sequence number determines which data is the most recent.

detaileddescription.para: Value use "," as delimiter.

briefdescription.para: "sequence.field.sort-order" - Specify the order of sequence.field.

detaileddescription.para: Values can be: "ascending", "descending". Default value is "ascending".

briefdescription.para: "merge-engine" - Specify the merge engine for table with primary key.

detaileddescription.para: Values can be: "deduplicate", "partial-update", "aggregation", "first-row". Default value is "deduplicate".

briefdescription.para: "sort-engine" - Specify the sort engine for table with primary key.

detaileddescription.para: Values can be: "min-heap", "loser-tree". Default value is "loser-tree".

briefdescription.para: "ignore-delete" - Whether to ignore delete records. Default value is "false".
"fields.default-aggregate-function" - Default aggregate function of all fields for partial-update and aggregate merge function.
"deletion-vectors.enabled" - Whether to enable deletion vectors mode.

detaileddescription.para: In this mode, index files containing deletion vectors are generated when data is written, which marks the data for deletion. During read operations, by applying these index files, merging can be avoided. Default value is false.

CHANGELOG_PRODUCER currently only support none
"changelog-producer" - Whether to double write to a changelog file. This changelog file keeps the details of data changes, it can be read directly during stream reads. This can be applied to tables with primary keys. Values can be "none", "input", "lookup", "full-compaction". Default value is "none".

briefdescription.para: "force-lookup" - Whether to force the use of lookup for compaction.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "partial-update.remove-record-on-delete" - Whether to remove the whole row in partial-update engine when records are received.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "partial-update.remove-record-on-sequence-group" - When records of the given sequence groups are received, remove the whole row.
"scan.fallback-branch" - When a batch job queries from a table, if a partition does not exist in the current branch, the reader will try to get this partition from this fallback branch.
"branch" - Specify branch name. Default value is "main".
"file-index.read.enabled" - Whether enabled read file index. Default value is "true".
"data-file.external-paths" - The external paths where the data of this table will be written, multiple elements separated by commas.
"data-file.external-paths.strategy" - The strategy of selecting an external path when writing data.

detaileddescription.para: Values can be: "none", "specific-fs", "round-robin". Default value is "none".

briefdescription.para: "data-file.prefix" - Specify the file name prefix of data files. Default value is "data-".
"index-file-in-data-file-dir" - Whether index file in data file directory.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "row-tracking.enabled" - Whether enable unique row id for append table.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "data-evolution.enabled" - Whether enable data evolution for row tracking table.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "partition.legacy-name" - The legacy partition name is using ToString for all types.

detaileddescription.para: If false, using casting to string for all types. Default value is "true".

briefdescription.para: "blob-as-descriptor" - Read and write blob field using blob descriptor rather than blob bytes.

detaileddescription.para: Default value is "false".

briefdescription.para: "global-index.enabled" - Whether to enable global index for scan. Default value is "true".
Configuration options and constants for Paimon table operations.

detaileddescription.para: The Options struct contains static string constants that define configuration keys used throughout the Paimon system.
